source.2735f742:
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib 
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
source.6bf7cd76:
columns = ['views', 'likes']


india = pd.read_csv('../input/youtube-new/INvideos.csv', usecols=columns) #India
usa = pd.read_csv('../input/youtube-new/USvideos.csv', usecols=columns)   #USA
ca = pd.read_csv('../input/youtube-new/CAvideos.csv', usecols=columns)    #Canada
gb = pd.read_csv('../input/youtube-new/GBvideos.csv', usecols=columns)    #Great Britian 
ge = pd.read_csv('../input/youtube-new/DEvideos.csv', usecols=columns)    #Germany
fr = pd.read_csv('../input/youtube-new/FRvideos.csv', usecols=columns)    #France
ru = pd.read_csv('../input/youtube-new/RUvideos.csv', usecols=columns)    #Russia
jp = pd.read_csv('../input/youtube-new/JPvideos.csv', usecols=columns)    #Japan
kr = pd.read_csv('../input/youtube-new/KRvideos.csv', usecols=columns)    #South Korea
mx = pd.read_csv('../input/youtube-new/MXvideos.csv', usecols=columns)    #Mexico
source.0eeb8c69:
matplotlib.pyplot.figure(figsize=(18,6))
plt.subplot(1, 2, 1)
sns.scatterplot(x=india["views"], y=india["likes"])
plt.title('INDIA')
plt.subplot(1, 2, 2)
sns.scatterplot(x=usa["views"], y=usa["likes"],color='darkred')
plt.title('USA')

matplotlib.pyplot.figure(figsize=(18,6))
plt.subplot(1, 2, 1)
sns.scatterplot(x=ca["views"], y=ca["likes"],color='darkred')
plt.title('CANADA')
plt.subplot(1, 2, 2)
sns.scatterplot(x=gb["views"], y=gb["likes"])
plt.title('GREAT BRITAIN')

matplotlib.pyplot.figure(figsize=(18,6))
plt.subplot(1, 2, 1)
sns.scatterplot(x=ge["views"], y=ge["likes"])
plt.title('GERMANY')
plt.subplot(1, 2, 2)
sns.scatterplot(x=fr["views"], y=fr["likes"],color='darkred')
plt.title('FRANCE')

matplotlib.pyplot.figure(figsize=(18,6))
plt.subplot(1, 2, 1)
sns.scatterplot(x=ru["views"], y=ru["likes"],color='darkred')
plt.title('RUSSIA')
plt.subplot(1, 2, 2)
sns.scatterplot(x=jp["views"], y=jp["likes"])
plt.title('JAPAN')

matplotlib.pyplot.figure(figsize=(18,6))
plt.subplot(1, 2, 1)
sns.scatterplot(x=kr["views"], y=kr["likes"])
plt.title('SOUTH KOREA')
plt.subplot(1, 2, 2)
sns.scatterplot(x=mx["views"], y=mx["likes"],color='darkred')
plt.title('MEXICO')
source.c13edc29:
regions_df = [india,usa,ca,gb,ge,fr,ru,jp,kr,mx]
region_names_list = ['India','United States', 'Canada','Great Britain', 'Germany', 'France', 'Russia',
                'Japan', 'South Korea', 'Mexico']

all_regions_df = pd.DataFrame(columns=['views', 'likes', 'country'])

for i in range (len(regions_df)):
    add = np.full((len(regions_df[i])),region_names_list[i])
    regions_df[i]['country'] = add
    all_regions_df= pd.merge(all_regions_df,regions_df[i], how='outer')
    
matplotlib.pyplot.figure(figsize=(16,16))
sns.scatterplot(x= all_regions_df["views"], y= all_regions_df["likes"], hue= all_regions_df["country"])
